com.intel.inde.mp

Class MediaComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.inde.mp.MediaComposer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MediaComposer
extends Object
implements Serializable
    MediaComposer class for lite video editing and transcoding: files joining, cut segments from files, effect applying
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addSourceFile

        public void addSourceFile(String fileName)
                   throws IOException,
                          RuntimeException
        Adds a file to the input files collection, has to be called for every input file
        Parameters:
        fileName - input String object
        Throws:
        IOException - when file name is invalid or file can not be opened
        RuntimeException - when file validation fails, i.e. audio sample rate differs from the first file
